abstract: Rapid Redux will never make it to the Breeders' Cup, but Thursday afternoon he has the opportunity to join one of its greatest performers in the record book.
snippet: Rapid Redux will never make it to the Breeders' Cup, but Thursday afternoon he has the opportunity to join one of its greatest performers in the record book.
lead_paragraph: 3:51 p.m. | Updated Rapid Redux led from gate to wire at Laurel Park to win his 19th straight race, tying the North American record held by Zenyatta and Peppers Pride.

headline.main: Rapid Redux Equals Record With 19th Straight Win
